lead_paragraph: Decisions about public gatherings are made at a local level in Germany, Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Friday, after Turkey accused Berlin of scandalous behavior in cancelling rallies of Turkish citizens where key Turkish ministers were to speak.

headline.main: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform
